title: Nora Roberts Collection - eReader Format [EbonyGold]
description:
Various Trilogies and Stand Alone novels by Nora Roberts - please refer to file list for list of titles.


To read these books you need the program eReader (available for hand held devices- go to eReader.com for instructions on how to load these books onto your device)
There are programs that are able to read these files on computer, but I know nothing of them so please do not ask me for help!

Please note if you are a formatting junkie I would recommend you do NOT download these books. All I do for my formatting is remove the section breaks - all spelling and grammatical errors remain as they were, as do paragraph errors.
I do however change the properties so the books will come up with Title and Author in eReader.

All of these books are available in the more mainstram formats (html, pdf, lit, doc). Search and you will find!

All files are virus scanned and are clean.
